title: (x) Jervis Shopping Center logo - FF Dax {Stephen}
content:
anyone recognise this? It’s the logo for an Irish shopping centre font, similar to Dax.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/jervis_4539.gif)
author: DermotHall

comments.content: It is [FF Dax](http://web.archive.org/web/20070620185344/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_dax_medium/&sample_text=Jervis&sample_size=36). They simply added a horizontal stroke to the ‘J’ and a square ‘i’ dot.
